team.name: Gintare Radaviciute
team.bioHtml: Experienced with Startups, Application Support, Customer Support, HR, Legal, Project management, Consultancy, Administrative, Business development.

jobs.title: Robotics Software Engineer
jobs.description:
Moley has created the world's first robotic kitchen. Featuring an advanced, fully functional robot integrated into a beautifully designed, professional kitchen, it cooks with the skill and flair of a master chef. The prototype was premiered to widespread acclaim at Hanover Messe, the international robotics show.

Looking for a vibrant office, startup environment, free office snacks, and drinks? Variety of wonderful people from different cultures/countries? This job might be for you then!

A role has become available for robotics software expert to join our product development team. The candidate will work both individually and in a small team to develop high-quality software to be included in our flagship product.

Skills & Requirements:

B.S. / M.S. / PhD in Robotics, Computer Science, or related field
2+ years of C++ development experience
Vast experience with ROS 
Any of these below would be a great add on:

Agile Experience
Robotics Experience (Manipulation, Algorithms, Inverse Kinematics, Grasping, Path-Planning) 
Computer Vision Experience (3D Pose Estimation, Object Recognition, Stereoscopy)
We take good care of our people. If you are the one for Moley Robotics, this is what we’ll offer you:

A competitive salary
Proven equipment
You will work in a scrum-based agile development cycle.
You will be working alongside founder, researchers, and engineers to design and build worlds first robotic kitchen unit.

skills: Computer Vision, Machine Learning, Robotics, Deep Learning
